alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 28 at 3:46PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF WIND RIVER MOUNTAINS WEST...WIND RIVER MOUNTAINS EAST...GREEN MOUNTAINS AND RATTLESNAKE RANGE...AND LANDER FOOTHILLS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 40 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 344 PM MST, a band of heavy snow was near Red Canyon, or 16 miles south of Lander, mainly impacting South Pass. LOCATIONS IMPACTED... This band of heavy snow will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Wind River Mountains West, southeastern Wind River Mountains East, west central Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and southeastern Lander Foothills Counties. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
